author: covarell
body:
#### PR description:

Just add a new alias for a PFTau-PFTau doublet filter in HLT. Needed for a new W->3pi HLT path.

#### PR validation:

Just verified scram compilation and used in HLT (no modification of existing code).

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40823, needed in CMSSW 12 in order to use HLT paths in 2023 online.
title: add double PFTau filter
